p: Due to the success of the 8-week CCHH ECHO series, the authors decided to launch a weekly 60 min CCHH ECHO “Continuous Conversation Office Hours,” beginning in August 18, 2021. Changes to the original format include shortening each session to 60 min, allowing more time for questions and answers, and planning for presentations on mental health, climate justice and environmental stewardship. The authors are also planning to begin a similar program in India, in addition to an 8 to 10 week “train the trainer” program, so that highly motivated health professionals may deliver a climate change course at their own institution.
